name: Springans Branga
effectText: If this card is in your hand, field, or GY: You can target 1 "Springans" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can banish this card and 1 "Springans" monster with a different name from your GY; add 1 "Springans" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Springans Branga" once per turn.
